item.title: Stock Management & Billing Application
item.description: This stock management system is a software designed to manage inventory and produce receipts. It is written in Python and utilizes major libraries such as abc, unittest, and os. The system reads in a CSV file of items and their details and converts it to a list. The application has six functions, which include adding, editing, and deleting item details such as name, category, perishable, stock, and sell price. It also has a full stock list, which displays all available items and their details.
